headline: Citizens Deepens Investment in Florida with Addition of $700 Million Advisory Team
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., January 21, 2025--Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE: CFG) today announced that it has further expanded its wealth management reach and capabilities in southern Florida, setting the stage for further growth in that key market.

headline: Citizens Financial Group to Participate at the UBS Financial Services Conference
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., January 21, 2025--Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE: CFG) announced today that Vice Chair and Chief Financial Officer John Woods will participate at the UBS Financial Services Conference 2025 on Tuesday, February 11, 2025 at 12:10 pm ET.
